subtitle: Tiny bites of cheese, deep-fried until golden brown.

method.text: Mix the cheese and onion with the flour and cayenne pepper. Whisk egg whites until stiff, fold into cheese mixture.

Heat oil to 180°C / 350F. Drop teaspoonfuls of the mixture into the hot fat - they will sink, then puff up and float. Cook for about 2 min until golden, turning halfway through cooking. Remove from pan and drain on kitchen paper.
Mix the soured cream with the chives in a bowl.
Arrange the fritters on a plate, and serve with the soured cream dip.

title: Crispy Cheddar cheese fritters
